definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: During the first half of this year, the country added a total of 26 million new Internet users.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，全國的網民增加了兩千六百萬。

sentences.english: The new Asia-Pacific Hub is expected to be fully operational the first half of 2009.
sentences.chinese: 新的亞太集散中心預期在2009年上半年全面運營。

sentences.english: For the first half of the year, complete long-term projects and tie up loose ends.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，完成長期的計劃並處理好細枝末節。

sentences.english: The first half of 2006 flights per week to 780 sorties .
sentences.chinese: 2006年上半年每週進出港航班爲780架次。

sentences.english: Only money and bond funds gained ground, according to the report.
sentences.chinese: 上半年，只有貨幣市場基金和債券型基金盈利。

sentences.english: square metres of land in the rst quarter;Wanke also acquired 5.62 million square metres of additional land reserves in the rst half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 萬科在今年上半年也追加了562萬平米的土地儲備。

sentences.english: Official statistics also show that the first half year saw rising prices for Beijing's residential houses.
sentences.chinese: 另據統計，今年上半年住宅成交均價呈直線上揚趨勢。

sentences.english: The company forecast first-half profit of 60 billion yen.
sentences.chinese: 該公司預計，上半年盈利爲600億日元。

sentences.english: Dung said he hoped the trade pact would besigned in the first half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 阮晉勇說他希望這個貿易協議能在今年上半年簽訂。

sentences.english: During the first half of year, only the cost of stocks has decreased over 50%.
sentences.chinese: 今年上半年，僅庫存一項，就下降了50%以上。

sentences.english: The first half of this year was a spend-less episode.
sentences.chinese: 今年上半年就是一個支出減少的週期階段。

sentences.english: In the first half of 2010, Shenyang commodity housing market maintained an upward trend.
sentences.chinese: 2010年上半年，沈城房價走勢在震盪中前行。

sentences.english: For the first half of the semester, we used the mountings built by last year's group.
sentences.chinese: 爲了在學期上半年，我們用去年的集團興建的座架。

sentences.english: The accountant prepare a balance sheet for the first half-year.
sentences.chinese: 會計已準備好上半年的資產負債表。

sentences.english: Hu said there had been all-round progress in China-Russia relations in the first half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤強調，今年上半年，中俄關系全面向前推進。

sentences.english: The needs of personal computers were surging in the first half of the year.
sentences.chinese: 今年上半年，家用電腦的需求量不斷猛增。

definition: within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
